desc: 20% boost to all parameters, damage taken may restore HP & reduces BB gauge required for BB

dictionary.lore: A small, almost unremarkable chunk of gold shaped vaguely like a heart, it contains many warm memories and happy thoughts tempered by a cruel world. The light shining brightly deep within can make even the saddest hearts happy once again. When placed in a toy soldier's chest, it can make him a real boy--almost.

name: Golden Heart
